tourBios.carHigh:
2015: Played in five European Tour events and made the cut in each start...Recorded back-to-back top-20 finishes at the Made in Denmark and D+D REAL Czech Masters... Joined PGA TOUR Latinoamérica with a T7 finish at the Sebring, FL Q-School in January, but only played the first two events of the season in March. Only cut made in Latin America was T58 at the Avianca Colombia Open... Finished T114 at Web.com Tour Qualifying Tournament to earn conditional status for the 2016 season.

2013: Played in three Web.com Tour events (Chile, Brazil and Kansas City), missing the cut all three...Made his first PGA TOUR start, missing the cut at the John Deere Classic...Qualified for the European Tour after finishing 8th at the final stage in Girona, Spain. 

2012: Open-qualified for The Rex Hospital Open and finished T41 in his debut on the circuit...Earned conditional status for 2013 season after placing T118 at the PGA TOUR Qualifying Tournament...Made two starts on the eGolf Tour, finishing T7 at The Championship at St. James Plantation and T10 at the Palmetto Hall Championship...Played five events on the NGA Hooters Tour and was T8 at the Kandy Waters Memorial Classic. 

2011: Finished T3 at the Hooters Tour's Kandy Waters Memorial Classic and also was T8 on the eGolf Tour at the Scratch Golf Classic.
tourBios.otherCarHigh: Earned first-team All-Conference USA honors in 2011…Was a four-time golf MVP at Mariner High School in Cape Coral, Fla…Won the 2010 Wolf Run Intercollegiate…Advanced to round of 16 at the U.S. Amateur in both 2009 and 2010…Attended the University of Louisville in 2008 before transferring to the University of Central Florida in 2009. Team won the Big East Championship in 2009 and was also part of the team that won the Conference USA Championship in 2010 and '11…Captured the 2007 Southwest Florida Amateur and the 2007 Cape Coral City Tournament.
tourBios.personal: Favorite golf memory was making the middle school golf team without having played much golf…Says he would work as a mechanic on high-end cars if he were not a professional golfer…Favorite sports team as a kid was the Boston Red Sox …Likes the Florida Gators…Never travels without anxiety pills for flying…Favorite athletes to watch are Michael Jordan and Floyd Mayweather…Not many people know he has a large tattoo of his last name across his back…His bucket list includes skydiving…His dream foursome would also include Brett Favre, Tiger Woods and Michael Jordan…His favorite TV shows include "King of Queens," "The Big Bang Theory" and "How I Met Your Mother."…Favorite movies include "The Shawshank Redemption," "Dumb & Dumber" and the "Bourne" series…Enjoys visiting San Francisco and North Carolina and favorite foods include pizza and ribs, while his favorite restaurants are Olive Garden, Red Lobster and the WingHouse…Uses a Liberty 50-cent coin as a ball marker…Two of his favorite courses are The Olympic Club and Pebble Beach…Would love to play Augusta National…Biggest thrill in golf is pulling off a shot under pressure andearning a scholarship to Central Florida…Among the snacks he carries in his golf bag are bananas, almonds and 10th Tee Bars…Would like to trade places with Lil Wayne for a day.

tourBios.exmtStatus: Conditional - Finished T114 at 2015 Web.com Tour Qualifying Tournament

dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the PGA TOUR Latinoameri was T58th in 2015 at the 68 Avianca Colombia Open presentado por Arturo Calle.
